languages.text: {n}Маражай издает взбешенный вопль и, подняв клинки, бросается на вас и ваших спутников первым.{/n}
{n}Marazhai lets out a furious cry and, raising his blades, rushes at you and your companions before you can move.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай издает взбешенный вопль и, подняв клинки, бросается на вас и ваших спутников первым.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋发出一声愤怒的咆哮。你还来不及做出任何反应，他便举起武器朝你和你的同伴袭来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a furious cry and, raising his blades, rushes at you and your companions before you can move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋发出一声愤怒的咆哮。你还来不及做出任何反应，他便举起武器朝你和你的同伴袭来。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai profiere un grito de furia y, enarbolando sus hojas, se abalanza contra ti y tus compañeros antes de que tengas ocasión de actuar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a furious cry and, raising his blades, rushes at you and your companions before you can move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai profiere un grito de furia y, enarbolando sus hojas, se abalanza contra ti y tus compañeros antes de que tengas ocasión de actuar.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un hurlement furieux et, brandissant ses lames, se précipite sur vos compagnons et vous avant que vous n'ayez le temps d'esquisser un geste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a furious cry and, raising his blades, rushes at you and your companions before you can move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai laisse échapper un hurlement furieux et, brandissant ses lames, se précipite sur vos compagnons et vous avant que vous n'ayez le temps d'esquisser un geste.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai stößt einen wütenden Schrei aus, erhebt seine Klingen und stürzt sich auf euch, bevor ihr reagieren könnt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a furious cry and, raising his blades, rushes at you and your companions before you can move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai stößt einen wütenden Schrei aus, erhebt seine Klingen und stürzt sich auf euch, bevor ihr reagieren könnt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは激しい雄叫びを上げると、刃を振り上げ、あなたたちが動く間もなく突進してくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a furious cry and, raising his blades, rushes at you and your companions before you can move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは激しい雄叫びを上げると、刃を振り上げ、あなたたちが動く間もなく突進してくる。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, öfkeyle haykırarak bıçaklarını kaldırıyor ve yoldaşlarınla birlikte daha hareket edemeden size doğru hücuma geçiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai lets out a furious cry and, raising his blades, rushes at you and your companions before you can move.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, öfkeyle haykırarak bıçaklarını kaldırıyor ve yoldaşlarınla birlikte daha hareket edemeden üzerinize hücuma geçiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
